work_summary: Created comprehensive UI design system comparison report analyzing example admin-chat-system vs current JSK Admin UI. Identified 64% component gap (21 missing components), 8 missing CSS animations, and primary color mismatch (blue vs purple).
priority_actions: Add missing UI components (Table, Form, Calendar, Popover, Sheet)
Add CSS animations (typing-dot, msg-in, msg-out, blink-badge, etc.)
Standardize primary color (blue vs purple decision)

decisions_pending: Primary color standardization (blue from example vs purple from current)

cross_platform_read.key_insight: Phase 2 components completed: MessageBubble, ChatHeader, MessageInput, EmojiPicker, StickerPicker
Zustand migration + UI restyle complete, tagged v1.4.0
